snippet: Zynga, the creator of FarmVille, Words With Friends and Mafia Wars, announced a new gaming platform on Thursday that will match up players who do not know each other.
abstract: Zynga, the creator of FarmVille, Words With Friends and Mafia Wars, announces a new gaming platform that will match up players who do not know each other; move is likely to reduce Zynga's reliance on Facebook, something analysts say the company needs to do.
lead_paragraph: Zynga, the creator of FarmVille, Words With Friends and Mafia Wars, announced a new gaming platform on Thursday that will match up players who do not know each other.

headline.seo: Zynga Seeks to Broaden Reach With New Gaming Platform
headline.main: Zynga Seeks to Match Up Players for Online Games
headline.print_headline: Zynga Seeks to Match Up Players for Online Games
